Description.Chinese: Makes Boreas airships (Arctic) attackable by same as ships. This mod is good if you own the Passage DLC, but not the Empire of the Skies DLC, so you can not build flak.
Description.English: Makes Boreas airships (Arctic) attackable by same as ships. This mod is good if you own the Passage DLC, but not the Empire of the Skies DLC, so you can not build flak.

Description.German: Macht Boreas Luftschiffe (Arktis) angreifbar von allem was auch Schiffe angreifen kann. Dieser Mod ist sinnvoll, wenn man das Passage DLC, aber nicht das Reich der Lüfte DLC besitzt und somit keine Flak bauen kann.
